title: Conectvice - Online Appointment Meeting App

title: Credit Card Management System
description: Credit card management system designed using Python with tkinter and phpMyAdmin SQL. This holds all your card information on the server and retrieves accordingly.Functions like generate pin and check remaining balance.

title: Custom Billing/Invoicing System
description: A bill calculator and invoicing program,its modular layout allows for the creation of various bill types.

title: Robotic Vacuum Design and Implementation
description: A robotic vacuum capable of handling basic cleaning tasks autonomously with different operational modes.
